## Usage

```{r warning=F, message=F}
library(voters)
```

```{r warning=F, message=F}
df <- getPS()
df
class(df)
```
```{r warning=F, message=F}
df <- getPS(spatial = FALSE)
df

```

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
if(!require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("jvieroe/voters")
```
